content.question: Which of the following is the most important step when providing psychological first aid? (Select only one)

answers.option: Listen: Actively hear the person and show support.
Look: Assess who needs help and prioritize.
Ignore: Wait until the person calms down by themselves.
Link: Connect them to family, friends, or professional help.

content.correct: Correct! Assessing who needs help and prioritizing (Look) is the most important first step in PFA.
content.incorrect: Incorrect. The correct answer is: Look: Assess who needs help and prioritize.
